Application Description :  

This system  has  been developed  for  various  companies of   Escorts

Group like JCB, EYML  etc. The  system    starts  with  definition of

budgets  at various levels i.e. company, group, plant,profit unit,cost

center,asset groups,assetsub  groups etc. Capital expenditure requests

(CER) are created after checking the budgets available.Purchase orders

are  created next , followed by  receipt  of   material and      bill

passing.After bills are passed,then relevant information like Po Number,

PO Date, Voucher Number, Voucher Date, Total Amount are  transfered to

WIP ( Work In Progress )  file.Then  data  in   the  WIP  file is then

capitalised  under  various  asset  codes  and  capitalised  data   is

transfered to Asset Master.The system also handles deletion of assets,

depreciation,revaluation,transfer of assets.
